channel.title: Loop Modeling on Zhaoyu Li
channel.description: Recent content in Loop Modeling on Zhaoyu Li

item.title: Paper note - Loop Modeling
item.description: Table of Contents Paper 1: [2000] - Modeling of loops in protein structures Paper 2: [2006] - A fold-recognition approach to loop modeling Paper 3: [2014] - Protein Loop Modeling Using a New Hybrid Energy Function and Its Application to Modeling in Inaccurate Structural Environments This article is kind of a literature review of loop modeling but not complete. Paper 1: [2000] - Modeling of loops in protein structures First (I think) paper about loop modeling is: Modeling of loops in protein structures (link).
